Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for DDoS protection, including expected traffic patterns, critical applications, and compliance needs.
Design the network architecture to integrate Azure DDoS Protection, including identifying protected resources and ensuring compatibility with existing network configurations.
Purchase and enable the Azure DDoS Protection Plan in the Azure portal for the required virtual networks.
Associate the DDoS Protection Plan with the virtual networks hosting critical resources to ensure they are protected.
Apply additional security measures such as Network Security Groups (NSGs) and Azure Firewall to complement DDoS protection.
Set up monitoring and alerting using Azure Monitor and DDoS Protection telemetry to track attack metrics and resource health.
Conduct simulated DDoS attack tests to validate the protection setup and ensure resources are safeguarded effectively.
Document the DDoS Protection setup, including configurations, monitoring procedures, and response plans for attacks.
Conduct training sessions for the operations team on managing and responding to DDoS attacks using Azure DDoS Protection.
Implement regular audits to ensure the DDoS Protection setup remains effective and compliant with organizational policies.
